page.title: 15ISSUES Essex/Cambs Border
page.content: There is concern about the expansion of Stansted Airport, attracting development and destroying peace and quiet. The village may have to expand due to the demand for more housing. There is a general worry about the economic state of the country. The disappearance of some hedges and trees concerns the conservationists especially since the impact of Dutch Elm disease. Farmers are concerned about future production - cereal crops are being overproduced. They are trying to diversify. There is anxiety about children going out alone in rural areas. Lowering of the water- table is of concern to people who rely on boreholes for their water supply.
